task: Insert an em dash or en dash
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Place the cursor where you want to insert the dash.
Press the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon at the top of the Word window.
In the 'Symbols' group, click on the 'Symbol' button.
A drop-down menu will appear. Select 'More Symbols' from the menu.
In the 'Symbol' dialog box, click on the 'Special Characters' tab.
Scroll through the list of special characters and locate the em dash or en dash.
Click on the em dash or en dash to select it.
Click on the 'Insert' button to insert the selected dash into your document.
The em dash or en dash will now be inserted at the cursor position in your document.
